content: **knitted slippers for baby with rib and garter stitch in drops fiesta sizes 0 4 years little captain kicks / drops baby 45-22 - knitted slippers for baby with rib and garter stitch in drops fiesta sizes 0 4 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #littlecaptainkickssocks drops design pattern fs-001-by yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years foot-length 9-10-11-12 14-16 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-50-50 100-100 g colour 21 sea captain **needles** drops circular needle size 4mm length 40 cm for stocking stitch and garter stitch drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm for rib **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
